Sentencas: The characteristics of the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) were introduced.
Titulo: Consumption analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The SOFC system can be divided into ten sections based on the Second Law of Thermodynamics.
Titulo: Consumption analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The fuel specific consumption was taken as the primary indicator to investigate the specific consumption for each section.
Titulo: Consumption analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The Energy-flow Framework Diagram (EFD) was undertaken to modify the system, such as controlling the operating temperature and strengthening insulation.
Titulo: Consumption analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: It is concluded that the specific consumption of the system is about 0.19 m(3)/kWh, taking great guidelines for the system improvement.
Titulo: Consumption analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
